last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jae-hyun searches for Tae-ra, but she is now with Kyo-jin. Everyone treats Jae-hyun like a lunatic.

name: Pandora: Beneath the Paradise
overview: Hong Taera gets trapped in a fate like that of Pandora in Greek mythology. With a perfect husband and a lovely daughter, Taera leads a life envied by all. However, her repressed memories resurface. She sets out to take revenge and protect her beloved family.
tagline: My perfect life is a perfect lie.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Jae-hyun is touted as a presidential candidate after Hatch presentation. Tae-ra regains her memory.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Tae-ra cannot believe that she is No.50. At Hatch, Red gets murdered. Hae-soo meets an informant.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jae-hyun declares his presidential candidacy and Kim Seon-deok appears. Tae-ra is troubled.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Hae-soo cannot accept that Tae-ra killed her father. Tae-ra chases the person who manipulated her life.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yu-ra is found dead, and Do-jin becomes a suspect. Hae-soo suggests Tae-ra appear on her talk show.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Hae-soo reveals Tae-ra's identity on the talk show. Sung-chan finds an unexpected item and joins Tae-ra.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Tae-ra learns Pil-seung is her younger brother. Hae-soo and Do-jin discover Jae-hyun's suspicious past.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Pil-seung confesses to assassinating President Ko Tae-sun, and Tae-ra tries to take the blame.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Kim Seon-deok dies in Tae-ra's hands at the banquet. Meanwhile, Hae-soo decides to reveal the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Tae-ra saves Hae-soo. The two finally face the truth about what happened fifteen years ago.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Jae-hyun cannot read Hae-soo's intentions. Tae-ra and Kyo-jin try to stop Hatch's second presentation.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Tae-ra and Hae-soo cooperate in finding Jae-hyun's weakness before the second Hatch presentation.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Jae-hyun fabricates Tae-ra's memories by inserting a chip. Hae-soo and Kyo-jin try to bring her back.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Tae-ra gets injured while saving Jae-hyun. The election starts, and the voting results are announced.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Jae-hyun gets away with a fire incident and spurs the inauguration ceremony of the Transition Team.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Jae-hyun searches for Tae-ra, but she is now with Kyo-jin. Everyone treats Jae-hyun like a lunatic.
